description: This file defines a 'Student' data model class for a kindergarten management system, including properties for student details, constructors, and methods for serialization, copying, and derived data.

classes.name: Student
classes.description: Represents a student with personal information and enrollment details, including methods for conversion to/from a map, copying, and obtaining full name.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Student object into a map for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Student instance from a map, typically retrieved from storage.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Student with optional modifications to its fields.

methods.name: fullName
methods.description: A getter that returns the full name of the student by combining first and last names.
